jdxi_editor.log.midi_info
=========================

.. py:module:: jdxi_editor.log.midi_info


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   jdxi_editor.log.midi_info.log_midi_info


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: log_midi_info(msb: int, lsb: int, pc: int) -> None

   Log MIDI information in a consistent format.

   :param msb: int most significant byte
   :param lsb: int least significant byte
   :param pc: int program
   :return: None
